change.changenote: Regulation BEFORE repealed by BC Reg 206/2015, effective November 6, 2015.

reg:regulation.reg:title: Voter Registration Regulation
reg:regulation.reg:amsincluded: [includes amendments up to B.C. Reg. 330/2008, November 25, 2008]

bcl:section.bcl:text: In this regulation, Act means the Election Act.

bcl:section.bcl:marginalnote: Information that may be requested by voter registration form
bcl:section.bcl:text: An application form referred to in section 35Â [application for registration] of the Act may request the following information:

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: the last 6 digits of the applicant's social insurance number;
a telephone number at which the applicant may be contacted.

bcl:section.bcl:marginalnote: Required information for online voter registration
bcl:section.bcl:text: If an application referred to in section 35 of the Act is made online through the Elections BC website, the application must include

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: the applicant's driver's licence number, or
the last 6 digits of the applicant's social insurance number.

bcl:section.bcl:marginalnote: Required information for voter registration by telephone
bcl:section.bcl:text: If an application referred to in section 35 of the Act is made orally by telephone, the applicant must provide

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: the applicant's driver's licence number, or
the last 6 digits of the applicant's social insurance number.

reg:content.reg:regnote: Note: this regulation replaces B.C. Reg. 421/95.
reg:content.reg:provisionsnote: [Provisions of the Election Act, R.S.B.C. 1996, c. 106, relevant to the enactment of this regulation: section 283]
